commit.message: Chore: Clean up formatting and remove unused field
Feat(Job): Create utility for converting DB model to rest model for jobs
Feat(Job): Update non-read methods in JobConfigActions to use new job accessor
Feat(Job): Update create method in JobConfigActions to use new job accessor
Feat(Job): Update the update method in JobConfigActions to use new job accessor
Fix(Job): Add missing fields to accessor and update integration tests

nodes.bodyText: Why is this no longer needed?
It might be better to have this listed closer to where it's actually used
Are all of these constants no longer available in this package? Using the same constants would cut down on any potential misspellings.
Do we want to make util classes final? I don't see any reason why we'd want someone extending this.
